Hi, there.
You guys can call me Me-ann. I prefer it that way. Other colleages call me with my first name, Mary, as well.

A little bit something about me .

Ever since I've become a mother, I look for ways to start earning money while taking care of my 2-year-old son. I found out soon enough that I can work remotely and that there are a lot of services I can offer and enhance to do just that. I remember long before, I was interested in coding and how websites work so I figured this is the industry that I should be working on enhancing. Then I realized it was not that easy, but still, nothing is easy if you don't work for it and when you get it, it will be all worth it!


I'm a self-taught Web developer (even saying this give me goosebumps, but yes I am!). Nowadays, everything you need to learn is out on the internet. You just need to have a good researching skill and the determination to get what you needed to learn. It all started when I saw an online course about learning Photoshop, Web Designing and Freelancing . I then study Web Development. I have a certificate in Web Developer Bootcamp from Udemy with Mr. Colt Steele as my Instructor. It is a 46.5-hour online course about front to back end development. I learned about HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 3 and 4, Javascript (ES6), MEN Stack (Mongo DB, Express JS, Node JS), and we also build a full-functioning website which covered everything and more from what we learned. I included it in my sample work (YelpCamp). I still have a long way to go. I keep on studying new techniques to build up what I know now. I look for other online tutorials and resources to supplement the information I have. I believe life is a series of unending courses that's why we have to keep on learning to satisfy our complicated brains.
